field.value: Using different models with same name in different databases

field.name: description
field.value: When you are accesing several databases with ActiveRecord, you put all models together in ActiveRecordStarter.Initialize. Different clases in differente namespaces could have the same names but this doesnt work with Initialize. I think that ActiveRecord could discriminate the model using the Namespace plus the Model Name instead of the Model Name only.
